author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons were arrested by Kovilpatti West police on Tuesday in connection with an explosion in a private water supply company in which a watchman was hurt on Monday.

The arrested were G. Subash Krishna (24) and S. Krishnakumar (40) of Shanmugasigamanipuram. Sources said the duo had links with the double murder, which occurred in Subash Pannaiyar’s farm near Pazhayakayal on March 8. The explosion, which caused injuries to M. Rajendran (55) of Keela Pandavarmangalam, watchman of the company, was caused by country-made bombs stashed by the assailants involved in the double murder.

After some country-made bombs were hurled during the gruesome murder of Pannaiyar’s aides -- M. Arumugasamy (32) of Surandai and A. Kannan (55) of Pazhayakayal --, a few unused ones were left in the house rented by the arrested duo for the company in Kovilpatti.

Car, sickle seized

A car and a sickle were also seized from them, sources said.
title: Two men arrested in Kovilpatti
